    • constant

      static DelayStrategy constant(Duration delay)
      Parameters:
      delay - not null, not Duration.isNegative()
      Returns:
      constant strategy with the given interval between tries
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if given delay is null or Duration.isNegative()
